LightningComponentBundle.description: Data-connected notification card that automatically fetches notification counts from Salesforce based on notification type.

property.name: notificationType
property.label: Notification Type
property.description: The type of notifications to display. Determines what data is queried and how the card is styled.

property.name: headingOverride
property.label: Heading Override
property.description: Optional: Override the heading text. Leave empty to use the default heading for the notification type.

property.name: descriptionOverride
property.label: Description Override
property.description: Optional: Override the description text. Leave empty to use the default description.

property.name: urlOverride
property.label: URL Override
property.description: Optional: Override the destination URL when the card is clicked.

property.name: className
property.label: Class Name
property.description: Additional CSS class to apply to the card.
